text: Bottle. Pours a golden color with a small white head. Has a fruity malty grainy weak grassy aroma. Fruity malty grainy grassy flavor. Has a fruity malty grainy grassy finish.

Hay, grass and farmhouse in the aroma. The taste is like the smell with a little maltiness. Not so bad that fills the upper part of the mouth for a long while. Not so good. But on a hot summer day, this would taste better. Follow me @ Kung av öl @ Facebook for more pictures and ratings.

4 finger white head, golden yellow body. Nose: Malty notes, peach, hay, grassy notes and white bread. Taste: Peach, hay, grassy notes, oranges, white bread, malt and cookies. Semi-long ending, with some bitterness and metallic notes.
Beslöjad gyllengul öl mer ett vitt skum. Doft av hö, bröd och lättare grästoner. Detsamma återkommer i smaken. Lite torrare än den ofiltrerade.

3 finger white head that quickly dissipates to a 1 finger one. 
Beautiful hazy, deep orange coloured beer. 
Aroma is citrus, spice (wheat style) and a slight tropical hoppy nose. Really simple but very pleasant smell. 
Taste is an amplified version of the classic spicy, wholewheat bready lager maltbase. Sweet, wheaty and hoppy kick at the back. 
Smooth and easy to drink, whilst still having a full, nicely carbonated body. 
A bit sticky in the mouth. Mildly bitter. 
Overall: Beautiful lager. Probably the best lager Ive had yet. Could be heavier on the breadiness and bitterness to achieve a full score though. Perfect to most meals or just to enjoy by itself on a warm evening in the summer. 
Show them how its done, Nils Oscar!

Bottle from web SB cons 2017-04-22 Göteborg 
AR: bready, grass, sweet
AP: hazy coppery, wee semi transparent white little head
F: bready, sweet, grass, rich carbonated,
Bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy goldenish pour with a frothy head. Notes of hay, grassy, some malty sweetness, floral and light hoppy.

Bottle from systembolaget.
Pours hazy orange with a white head. 
Malty, smooth with a balanced bitterness.

Bottled, from Systembolaget.  Cloudy golden, rocky head. Distinct floral spicy nose. Mid dry with solid body and rounded mouthfeel. Bready, spicy and grassy. Really bitter finish. Pretty good, but much of the focus is on bitter hops, rather than malt softness.
Draught @ Lådan. A well made helles, drinkable and true to style. Heavy on the malts. A bit rough. Notes of marzipan, apricots, knäckebröd, minerals and herbs.
Nästintill klar, gul, vitt skum. Doft: Gräs, lager, jäst, malt, limpa. Fräsch. Smak: Som doft + alkohol. För att vara en maltig lager, helt ok.
Bottled. Golden colour, small white head. Aroma is grassy, herbal and some earthy notes. Flavour is grassy, herbal, yeasty and some bready maltiness to it. Quite ok.

Bottled 500ml
Slightly hazy yellow color, small white head. A bit sweetish malty aroma, some grain and grass. Light to medium-bodied. A bit grainy and sweet, pale malty pils. Good kellerbier.

50cl bottle, thanks oh6gdx. 
The beer pours golden color with a thin white head. 
Dusty earthy, malty aroma. Some apple notes, grains, malt and sweetness. Long sweet finish.

Pours hazy golden with low white head 
Aromas crisp, sweet of bread, hay, sweet corn, slightly herbal 
Taste has notes of bread, hay, corn, sweet malty fruityness, light notes of herbs

Pours hazy orange with a low white head. Aromas of citrus, orange rinds, minerals, yeast, some maize starch. Taste is bready with mineral notes and some fruitiness. Mouthfeel is light bodied with medium carbonation.

Bottle. Hazy golden orange beer with a large white head. Aroma is spicy with notes of citrus, bread, herbs, hay, grass and yeast. Flavor is spicy with notes of bread, herbs, hay, grass and yeast. Well balanced.
Flaska från SB. Smak och doft av humle, malt, bröd, honung, säd, gräs med toner av citrus och karamell. Fin kropp och maltsötma, bra balans, fruktig, torr, fin beska.
Flaska. Oklar guldfärgad med ett vitt frostigt skum. Dofter och smaker av malt, gräs, vitt bröd samt blomster. I smaken tillkommer honung. Välbalanserad. Trevlig.
Pilsnerfärgad grumlig med vit skum. Doftar och smakar maltigt, lite humle och jäst. Fyllig och helt ok lager!

@ Havregatan 20170304. Bottle (500 ml) from Systembolaget. Malty, grassy and bready with light caramely and fruity notes, honey, light sweet, medium body with an oily texture. The finish is dry, malty and bready with some light fruity notes.

Bottle from Systembolaget. Fruity smell with some bread and hay. Similar taste. Slight rough mouthfeel. I prefer this to the normal God Lager. It has a more interesting taste and smell and a better mouthfeel.

Bottle. Almost clear deep golden liquid with medium egg shell white head. Aroma of grain, bread, toast, earth, floral hops and light caramel. Taste is very light sweet and light to medium bitter with notes of bread, grain, toast and flowers. Medium bodied with medium carbonation. Super drinkable. Clean. Balanced. Delicious lager!

UPDATED: MAR 1, 2017 Flaska 50 cl SB. Disig gyllengul vätska. Pigg, brödig och höig doft med örter och lite mineraler. Krispig och uppfriskande smak. Bröd, örter, blött hö med mjuk humleton. Viss fruktighet. Lättdrucken, krispig och fräsch

Bottle bought @ Systembolaget. Hazy golden pour with a small frothy white head. Very pleasant soft mellow malt nose with fresh bread, toasted cereal & clear floral hops. Tiny sweet, slightly bitter, malty & floral taste. Soft, round & tiny astringent mouthfeel. Soft fresh bread & honey floral finish. Very nice almost franconian styled lager. Love it!

Aroma is crisp light bread and summer flowers with a grassy touch. Taste is rich (for a lager) with citrus, white bread, light honey and a faint touch of orange peelings. I strongly suspect that theyve made some minor change to the hop profile as well, cause the regular one gets its ass whooped big time by this one.

Ar: straw, Grass, bready, light cookies.
Hazy golden colour, small white head, light lacing.
Medium bite, mid-sweet, grassy, bready, minerals and herbs. 
Medium body, average carbonation, lightly bitter finish. 
Ok.

Bottled from Systembolaget
Hazy golden with a white head. 
Bready, malty aroma and flavour. 
Fruity, Dusty flavour with a medium bitterness.

Bottle from Systembolaget Viksjö. Hazy golden with a medium white head. Aroma of bread, flowers and some grass. Similar taste, also some light honey. The mouthfeel was around medium and the bitterness quite soft. An easy to drink one.
@Basunen 17-2-24: Ganska trevlig och känns lite fräschare enn den vanliga. Toner av gräs och blommor samt vitt bröd. Trevlig.

Flaska från SB. Gyllengul, rejält disig med medelhöft vitt skum. Doft av ljust bröd, sommarblommor, mandel, jäst, honung. Mjuk fin munkänsla, runda harmoniska smaker som doften med djup och fina nyanser. Lätt beska. Riktigt trevlig.

Bottle from sstrembolaget. Pours beautifully, a golden murky colour. Smells of coriander, lemon, some yeast. It tastes very thick and filling, slight alcohol. It is a good beer but leagues behind the Pilsner urquell unfiltered.

Bottle 500ml. Hazy amber with a fluffy white head, no lacing. Yeast sediment in the bottle. Heavy on the malts in the aroma and taste. Aroma has toasted bread and sweet caramel. More punch than its filtered sibling.

500ml bottle. Hazy orange body with amedium white head. Fruit, dough, bread, grass and honey. Nice alternative version of the original, but the added body took a bit too much attention from the hops imo.
500ml Bottle - Hazy amber/orange in colour. Bread and citrus in the aroma. Malty and bready taste with grass, orange and a hint of caramel.
Bottle from SB. Cloudy orange with a thick white head. Fruity and hoppy tones. Malt, fruit, caramel and hops. Medium body with a nice bitter/ fruity finish.
Bottle (55 cl) from Systembolaget. Shady golden, medium white head. Bready malt aroma, some herbal hops. Medium bodied, soft carbonation. Dry, low to medium bitterness.

500ml bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy golden, frothy white head, some lacing. Grassy and floral aroma, hay, earth and bread. Very smooth and chewy mouthfeel, soft carbonation, medium bodied. Taste follows the aroma, pleasant grassy and floral bitterness, bread, hay and citrus. Crisp and dry finish.
